Shift Type

fields.description: The time before the shift start time during which Employee Check-in is considered for attendance.
fields.label: Begin check-in before shift start time (in minutes)

fields.description: Time after the end of shift during which check-out is considered for attendance.
fields.label: Allow check-out after shift end time (in minutes)

fields.description: The time after the shift start time when check-in is considered as late (in minutes).
fields.label: Late Entry Grace Period

fields.description: The time before the shift end time when check-out is considered as early (in minutes).
fields.label: Early Exit Grace Period

fields.description: Working hours below which Absent is marked. (Zero to disable)
fields.label: Working Hours Threshold for Absent

fields.default: Alternating entries as IN and OUT during the same shift
fields.label: Determine Check-in and Check-out
fields.options:
Alternating entries as IN and OUT during the same shift
Strictly based on Log Type in Employee Checkin

fields.label: Working Hours Calculation Based On
fields.options:
First Check-in and Last Check-out
Every Valid Check-in and Check-out

fields.description: Working hours below which Half Day is marked. (Zero to disable)
fields.label: Working Hours Threshold for Half Day

fields.description: Maximum Working hours for Shift (any extra hours will be ignored in attendance or Zero to disable)
fields.label: Max Working Hours

fields.description: Mark attendance based on 'Employee Checkin' for Employees assigned to this shift.
fields.label: Enable Auto Attendance

fields.description: The time after the shift start time when check-in is considered as late (in minutes).
fields.label: Late Entry Grace Period

fields.description: The time after the shift start time when check-in is considered as late (in minutes).
fields.label: Early Exit Grace Period

fields.description: Attendance will be marked automatically only after this date.
fields.label: Grace Period Settings For Auto Attendance

fields.description: Last Known Successful Sync of Employee Checkin. Reset this only if you are sure that all Logs are synced from all the locations. Please don't modify this if you are unsure.
